Enum BentStyle

java.lang.Object

      horstmann.ch08_umleditor.BentStyle
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<BentStyle>
public enum BentStyle
extends java.lang.Enum<BentStyle>

A style for a segmented line that indicates the number and sequence of bends.
